channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: FTC reportedly opens antitrust investigation into Microsoft
item.description: The FTC has launched an antitrust investigation into Microsoft, according to multiple reports that corroborate earlier reporting by the Financial Time...

item.title: The Apple AirPods Pro Are The Cheapest We've Ever Seen
item.description: We just found the best Black Friday deal on the best earbuds for iPhone owners.

item.title: US to Introduce New Restrictions on China’s Access to Cutting-Edge Chips
item.description: The new limits, which are expected to be announced Monday, are intended to slow China’s ability to build large and powerful AI models.

item.title: Google Chat now has its own take on Slack’s Huddles

item.title: The 11 Best TVs We’ve Reviewed, Plus Buying Advice (2024)
item.description: From LEDs to fancy OLED models, these are our favorite televisions at every price.

item.title: 16 Best Gifts for Men, Manly Men, and Menly Man Men (2024)
item.description: When you need something that's as unnecessarily masculinized as you can get for the Man™ in your life, we have you covered.

item.title: Time spent online by adults in the UK jumped by nearly an hour in 2024 says Ofcom
item.description: Adults are spending an average of 4 hours and 20 minutes each day online across smartphones, tablets and computers in the U.K., according to figures f...

item.title: Best Black Friday Phone Deals (2024), Including Cases Too
item.description: Need a smartphone? These Black Friday deals are the best we've seen all year on Android phones, accessories, and even iPhones.

item.title: India, already an IPO bright spot, prepares for bigger surge in 2025

item.title: HongShan, spun out of Sequoia last year, is reportedly struggling to invest its huge war chest
